sen.j: 北大路駅（きたおおじえき）は、京都府京都市北区 (京都市)小山北上総町にある、京都市営地下鉄京都市営地下鉄烏丸線の鉄道駅。
sen.e: Kitaoji Station, located in Koyama Kita Kamifusa-cho, Kita Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a railway station of the Karasuma Line of Kyoto Municipal Subway.
Kitaoji Station, located in Koyama Kita Kamifusa-cho, Kita Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a railway facility of the Karasuma Line of Kyoto Municipal Subway.
Kitaoji Station, located in Koyama Kita Kamifusa-cho, Kita Ward (Kyoto City), Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a railway facility of the Karasuma Line of Kyoto Municipal Subway.

sen.j: 駅番号はK04。
sen.e: Its station Number is K04.
Its station number is K04.
Its station number is K04.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: プラットホーム1面2線の地下駅。
sen.e: This station is an underground station which has a platform for 2 tracks.
This station is an underground station having a platform for two tracks.
This station is an underground station having a platform for two tracks.

sen.j: エスカレーター・エレベーター・トイレ（身体障害者用あり）完備。
sen.e: The station is equipped with escalators, elevators and toilets (toilets for the handicapped are available).
The station is equipped with escalators, elevators and toilets (toilets for the handicapped are available).
The station is equipped with escalators, elevators and toilets (toilets for the handicapped are available).

sen.j: 改札口は南北1ヶ所ずつあり、南改札のみ駅員が配備されている。
sen.e: Ticket gates are located south side and north side of the station and the station staff is positioned only at the south ticket gate.
Ticket gates are located on the north and south sides of the station, but station staff are positioned only at the south ticket gate.
Ticket gates are located on the north and south sides of the station, but station staff are positioned only at the south ticket gate.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 北大路通（国道367号）と烏丸通の交差点北側の地下にあり、地上の複合施設キタオオジタウンと一体的構造になっている。
sen.e: The station is situated underground at the north side of the crossing of Kitaoji-dori Street (National Highway 367) and Karasuma-dori Street and the station building is united with Kitaojitaun, the complex situated aboveground.

The station is situated underground at the north side of the crossing of Kitaoji-dori Street (National Highway 367) and Karasuma-dori Street, and the station building is united with Kitaojitaun, the complex situated aboveground.

The station is situated underground at the north side of the crossing of Kitaoji-dori Street (National Route 367) and Karasuma-dori Street, and the station building is united with Kitaoji Town, the complex situated aboveground.
sen.cmt: 国道→national routeとしました。Kitaojitaun →Kitaoji Town としました。

sen.j: キタオオジタウン内
sen.e: Inside of Kitaojitaun
The interior of Kitaojitaun
The interior of Kitaoji Town

sen.j: 京都市営バス北大路バスターミナル・京都市営バス烏丸営業所（下記）
sen.e: Kitaoji Bus Terminal of Kyoto City bus ・ Kyoto City Bus Karasuma Eigyosho (Karasuma business office) (shown below)
Kitaoji Bus Terminal of Kyoto City Bus ・ Kyoto City Bus Karasuma Eigyosho (Karasuma business office) (shown below)
Kitaoji Bus Terminal of Kyoto City Bus and Kyoto City Bus Karasuma Eigyosho (Karasuma business office) (shown below)

sen.j: 北大路ビブレ（商業施設）
sen.e: Kitaoji VIVRE (commercial facilities)
Kitaoji VIVRE (commercial facilities)
Kitaoji VIVRE (commercial facilities)

sen.j: 京都市北文化会舘
sen.e: Kyoto City North Culture Hall
Kyoto City North Culture Hall
Kyoto City North Culture Hall

sen.j: 大谷大学
sen.e: Otani University
Otani University
Otani University

sen.j: 大谷大学短期大学部
sen.e: Otani University Junior College
Otani University Junior College
Otani University Junior College

sen.j: 立命館小学校
sen.e: Ritsumeikan Primary School
Ritsumeikan Primary School
Ritsumeikan Elementary School

sen.j: 京都府立植物園（鴨川 (淀川水系)を渡り約1km）
sen.e: The Kyoto Botanical Garden (about 1 km away with crossing the Kamo-gawa River (the Yodo-gawa River system))
The Kyoto Botanical Garden (about 1 km away, across the Kamo-gawa River (Yodo-gawa River system))
The Kyoto Botanical Garden (about one km away, across the Kamo-gawa River (Yodo-gawa River system))
sen.cmt: 数字をスペルアウトしました。

sen.j: 烏丸通・北大路通に沿って商店街がある。
sen.e: Shopping districts are located along Karasuma-dori Street and Kitaoji-dori Street.
Shopping districts are located along Karasuma-dori and Kitaoji-dori streets.
Shopping districts are located along Karasuma-dori and Kitaoji-dori streets.

tit.j: 北大路バスターミナル

sen.j: 北大路駅の一つ上の地下階に存在する京都市営バス有数のバスターミナル。
sen.e: It is one of the major bus terminals of Kyoto City bus and situated on the basement floor right above Kitaoji Station.
This is one of the major bus terminals of Kyoto City Bus, and is situated on the basement floor directly above Kitaoji Station.
This is one of the major bus terminals of Kyoto City Bus, and is situated on the basement floor directly above Kitaoji Station.

sen.j: 京都産業大学・上賀茂神社・金閣寺・修学院・高野方面など洛北への観光地方面へのバスが発着する。
sen.e: Buses bound for Rakuhoku sightseeing area, including Kyoto Sangyo University, Kamigamo-jinja Shrine, Kinkaku-ji Temple, Shugakuin (Imperial Villa) and Takano, depart from and arrive at this bus terminal.

Buses bound for the Rakuhoku sightseeing area, including Kyoto Sangyo University, Kamigamo-jinja Shrine, Kinkaku-ji Temple, Shugakuin (Imperial Villa) and Takano, depart from and arrive at this terminal.

Buses bound for the Rakuhoku sightseeing area, including Kyoto Sangyo University, Kamigamo-jinja Shrine, Kinkaku-ji Temple, Shugakuin (Imperial Villa) and Takano, depart from and arrive at this terminal.

sen.j: 過去には地上1階にバスターミナルが存在したが、1995年にキタオオジタウンが竣工し地下化された。
sen.e: This bus terminal used to exist on the ground floor but it was moved to the basement when Kitaojitaun was completed in 1995.
This bus terminal used to be located on the ground floor, but with the completion of Kataojitaun in 1995 it was moved to the basement.
This bus terminal used to be located on the ground floor, but with the completion of Kitaoji Town in 1995 it was taken underground.

sen.j: 現在は、降車ホームが1つと、乗車ホームが2つ（赤のりば、青のりば）に分かれている。
sen.e: At present, there exists 1 platform for getting off and 2 platforms for getting on (red platform and blue platform).
Currently, there is one platform for getting off and two platforms for getting on (the red and blue platforms, respectively).
Currently, there is one platform for getting off and two platforms for getting on (the red and blue platforms, respectively).

sen.j: ホームの間の乗り換えは1層下の通路を使うため、若干不便である。
sen.e: It is a bit inconvenient to move from a platform to another platform because in order to do so, it is necessary to use the passway which is situated one floor below.
It is somewhat inconvenient to move from one platform to another because, in order to do so, one must use the passageway situated one floor below.
It is somewhat inconvenient to move from one platform to another because, in order to do so, one must use the passageway situated one floor below.

sen.j: かつては京都バスの岩倉・大原方面（かつては市バス路線だった路線もあり）への路線も発着していたが、国際会館駅発着に再編される形で廃止された。
sen.e: In the past, buses bound for Iwakura/Ohara operated by Kyoto Bus Co.,Ltd. (some buses were operated by Kyoto City Bus) used to depart from and arrive at this bus terminal but currently, they depart from and arrive at Kokusaikaikan Station.

In the past, buses bound for Iwakura/Ohara operated by Kyoto Bus Co., Ltd. (some buses were operated by Kyoto City Bus) would depart from and arrive at this bus terminal, but currently they depart from and arrive at Kokusaikaikan Station.

In the past, buses bound for Iwakura/Ohara operated by Kyoto Bus Co., Ltd. (some buses were operated by Kyoto City Bus) would depart from and arrive at this bus terminal, but currently they depart from and arrive at Kokusaikaikan Station.

sen.j: 他にも烏丸北大路交差点東側と南側に「北大路駅前」バス停があり、東側は市バス（西行きは系統によっては停車しない）および出町柳駅発着の京都バス（両方向）の便が停車する。
sen.e: In addition, there exists bus stops, called "Kitaojieki-mae" on the east and south side of the crossing of Karasuma-dori Street and Kitaoji-dori Street and at the bus stop of east side, buses of Kyoto City Bus (depending on routes, some buses running to west don't stop) and those of Kyoto Bus Co.,Ltd. whose terminal is Demachiyanagi Station (both directions) make a stop.

Additionally, there are bus stops, called "Kitaojieki-mae" on the east and south sides of the crossing of Karasuma-dori and Kitaoji-dori streets, as well as at the bus stop of east side; buses of Kyoto City Bus (depending on the route, some buses running west don't stop); and those of Kyoto Bus Co., Ltd., whose terminal is Demachiyanagi Station (both directions), make stops.

Additionally, there are bus stops, called 'Kitaojieki-mae' on the east and south sides of the crossing of Karasuma-dori and Kitaoji-dori streets; at the bus stop on the east side, buses of Kyoto City Bus (depending on the route, some buses running west don't stop) and those of Kyoto Bus Co., Ltd., whose terminal is Demachiyanagi Station (both directions) make stops.
sen.cmt: 一部翻訳を修正しました。

sen.j: 南側は市バス37系統が停車する。
sen.e: At the bus stop of south side, buses of route 37 of Kyoto City Bus make a stop.
At the bus stop on the south side, the Route 37 buses of Kyoto City Bus stop.
At the bus stop on the south side, the Route 37 buses of Kyoto City Bus stop.

sen.j: 1981年（昭和56年）5月19日 烏丸線開業時に、その起点駅として設置。
sen.e: May 19, 1981 - When the Karasuma Line came into operation, this station was established as its station of origin.
May 19, 1981: When the Karasuma Line came into operation, this station was established as its facility of origin.
May 19, 1981: When the Karasuma Line came into operation, this station was established as its facility of origin.

sen.j: 1990年（平成2年）10月24日 北山-北大路間の延伸開業により、途中駅となる。
sen.e: October 24, 1990 - Kitayama-Kitaooji section came into operation as an extension of the line and this station became a midway station.
October 24, 1990: The Kitayama-Kitaooji section came into operation as an extension of the line, and this station became a midway station.
October 24, 1990: The Kitayama-Kitaoji section came into operation as an extension of the line, and this station became a midway station.

sen.j: 2007年（平成19年）4月1日 PiTaPa使用開始。
sen.e: April 1, 2007 - PiTaPa became available.
April 1, 2007: PiTaPa became available.
April 1, 2007: PiTaPa became available.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。
